snippet: France's advertising watchdog on Monday said it had asked French fashion house Yves Saint Laurent to modify two ads from its latest campaign after receiving 50 complaints that they were "degrading" to women....

headline.main: Senate to Consider Repeal of Obama-Era Labor Rule
headline.print_headline: Senate to Consider Repeal of Obama-Era Labor Rule

lead_paragraph: France's advertising watchdog on Monday said it had asked French fashion house Yves Saint Laurent to modify two ads from its latest campaign after receiving 50 complaints that they were "degrading" to women.
